channel.title: Home on sven.eisenschmidt.website
channel.description: Recent content in Home on sven.eisenschmidt.website

item.title: Daily Photo: Winter Walk
item.description:
A winter walk with Tilian and Aika. The fresh snow has been melting during the day but freezing overnight, leaving icy patches everywhere. Plenty of slipping and sliding along the way, with the kids landing on their backsides more than once. Aika seemed completely unfazed.

Starting my daily photo journey, inspired by Jasper’s daily photos who is on a 337-day streak. I hope this will help me reflect more consciously on the past.

item.title: 2025 Wrapped
item.description: My year 2025 in numbers and highlights, wrapped-style. First attempt at summarizing an eventful year. More platforms offering wrapped/replay summaries obviously helped.

item.title: Death Stranding 2
item.description: Over the Xmas period I managed to finish Death Stranding 2. The game is a perfect mix between logistics, base building and shooter action for me.I like it more than the Metal Gear Solid games.

item.title: Open Source
item.description: End of 2025 I spent 100 hours on a single open source project. I did similar things over the past twenty years (oh my!) but always lost interest. This time was different. The software is actually used at my company. Spoiler: I will happily discontinue it.

item.title: Hello
item.description: Welcome to my website. I work as Chief Technology & Product Officer at roadsurfer, where we help people explore the world in campervans.
